Dialogs.Text: Thomas B: ...I don't know anyone here, it's still to early to say that...
Thomas B: I mean, they are definetly here, but i don't even know the rest of the users to arrive at a conclusion like that.
Thomas B: The thought crossed my mind because of many novels, i read a lot. But throwing a something like that in reality...
Thomas B: Well, that would just make me a conspiracy theorist.
Thomas B: I learned my lesson before.
Thomas B: Anyway... The only thing reasonable i can think of is...

Elections.CandidateName: He knows me from way back
It's a member inside this chat
